query.name: offset
query.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is empty. if data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

query.name: attribute_status
query.description: 1:get item lack of requires attribute. 2:get item lack of optional attribute.

query.name: item_sku
query.description: sku. If you search for item_sku and item_name at the same time, only the results that match item_sku will be returned. If you search for item_sku and attribute_status at the same time, the results that match both item_sku and attribute_status will be returned.

query.name: item_status
query.description: NORMAL/BANNED/UNLIST/REVIEWING/SELLER_DELETE/SHOPEE_DELETE If you want to search multiple status, please upload the url like this: item_status=NORMAL&item_status=BANNED

query.name: deboost_only
query.description: If deboost_only is true, then API will return items whose deboost is true, if deboost_only is empty or false, then API will return items whose deboost is true and false simultaneously

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/search_item?access_token=access_token&attribute_status=2&item_name=apple&offset=0&page_size=10&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: warning
schema.description: Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

schema.name: total_count
schema.description: Total num of items match condation.

schema.name: next_offset
schema.description: If has_next_page is true, this value need set to next request.offset
